<b>1. Direct Deposit via BDO
<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-23092" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/bdo.png" alt="" width="55" height="21" />
</b><strong>2. Paypal </strong> - ( Additional 3.4% + Php15 transaction fee on checkout page )
<img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-23113" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/paypal.png" alt="" width="55" height="20" />
<strong>3. Credit and Debit Card</strong> - ( Additional 3.4% + Php15 transaction fee on checkout page )
<img class="alignnone wp-image-23126" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/visa.png" alt="" width="49" height="29" />     <img class="alignnone wp-image-23109" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/mastercard.png" alt="" width="48" height="29" />     <img class="alignnone wp-image-23128" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/maestro-1-e1542278064388.png" alt="" width="49" height="33" />     <img class="alignnone wp-image-23104" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/jcb.png" alt="" width="56" height="39" />     <img class="alignnone wp-image-23090" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/american-express-e1542278223598-300x191.png" alt="" width="67" height="39" />
processed via Paypal**<a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CxTCSTBjsyziFILmU4O3nNlIvL0Yqm2pZ78eznb21gM/edit" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> Convert Credit Cart transactions to Installment payments</a>

*Should you wish to pay us using a credit card, you may be required to send us a photocopy of the credit card together with a valid ID of the card owner. This measure is done for verification purposes only, in accordance to Philippine Payment Gateways’ fraud prevention scheme.

<!-- RuralNet Banks and Coop -->

<!-- BPI --><strong>6. Cash upon Pick-up</strong> - allowable for orders with a maximum grand total of PHP20,000 and below. Orders will be picked-up to Galleon's office.
<strong>7. Cash on Delivery</strong> - allowable for orders with a maximum grand total of PHP20,000 and below. Shipping location is available nationwide.
<strong>8. 7/11 or Coins.ph</strong> - reference code will generate via Coins.ph (2% fee charged to the customer upon billing for 7/11 payments).

&nbsp;
<div class="bdo-payment bank-payment">

<strong>For Bank Deposit. Please deposit the amount to our bank account in BDO :</strong>

<strong>For BDO Accounts: </strong>

Bank : Banco De Oro
Bank Account name : STERLING GALLEON CORPORATION
Bank Account number : 001458019167 (PESO ACCOUNT)
Bank Branch : Pasong Tamo Ext.

<strong>NOTE:</strong> Please ask teller to note down your order number in your deposit
(your order number is ___)

</div>
And mail us at <a>support@galleonph.zendesk.com</a> with the deposit slip.

*Should you wish to pay us using a credit card issued by banks outside the country, you may be required to send us a photocopy of the credit card together with a valid ID of the card owner. This measure is done for verification purposes only, in accordance to Philippine Payment Gateways’ fraud prevention scheme.
<div id="paymentPolicy" class="payment-policy">

<strong>Deposit Policy</strong>

Please be reminded that we are implementing <strong>one deposit slip</strong> per transaction policy. After each successful deposit, you have 2 options:
<ol>
 	<li>Send an email at support@galleon.ph or contact us and indicate
<ol type="a">
 	<li>Order number (your order number is ___)</li>
 	<li>Date of deposit</li>
 	<li>Branch code (refer to the deposit slips below)</li>
 	<li>Amount deposited
Sample Cash Transaction Slip
<img class="alignnone  wp-image-23095" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/cash_slip_new.jpg" alt="" width="1361" height="668" />
Sample Check Transaction Slip
<img class="alignnone  wp-image-23097" src="https://www.galleon.com.ph/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/check_slip_new.jpg" alt="" width="1358" height="672" /></li>
</ol>
</li>
 	<li>Email us a scanned copy or photo of your deposit slip to support@galleon.ph with your order number as the subject line</li>
 	<li>Make sure you keep a copy of your deposit slip for future references.</li>
</ol>
*This is for verification purposes. Make sure you keep a copy of your deposit slip for future references. Should you have any questions, you may reach us through the numbers below. Thank you very much for shopping at Galleon.ph!

<strong>BDO Online Fund Transfer (Send Money to an unenrolled BDO account)</strong>
<ol class="payment-instructions">
 	<li>Follow the instructions here:
<ol>
 	<li><a href="https://www.mybdo.com.ph/fo/faq#Send_Money_Unerolled" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://www.mybdo.com.ph/fo/faq#Send_Money_Unerolled</a></li>
</ol>
</li>
 	<li>Forward to <a>support@galleon.ph</a> the confirmation email BDO will send you and indicate your order number on the subject line or body</li>
 	<li>You may also Email, Call or SMS us of the Transaction Reference Number Ex:<strong>PC-20151217-1222528</strong></li>
</ol>
<strong>BDO ATM Banking (Send Money using ATM card to other unenrolled BDO Account)</strong>
<ol>
 	<li>Insert your ATM card at any BDO ATM Machine</li>
 	<li>Select <strong>Fund transfer</strong></li>
 	<li>Choose <strong>Savings</strong> if your account is savings and <strong>Current</strong> if your account is in current</li>
 	<li>Select <strong>Other BDO Account</strong></li>
 	<li>Enter Account number of STERLING GALLEON CORP. - <strong>001458019167 →</strong> then <strong>Confirm</strong>.</li>
 	<li>Enter the amount you want to transfer. → then <strong>Confirm</strong>.</li>
 	<li>Lastly, enter your Pin Number.</li>
 	<li>Email us a photo of your deposit receipt to <a>support@galleon.ph</a> with your order number as the subject line.</li>
 	<li>You may also Call us or SMS us the <strong>Deposit Receipt Number</strong> indicated on the receipt you will get in the ATM.</li>
 	<li>Make sure you keep a copy of your deposit receipt for future references.</li>
 	<li class="no-list-style"></li>
 	<li class="no-list-style">**Deducts a Php 10 transaction fee to you</li>
 	<li class="no-list-style">**Maximum of: 50,000 per transaction Per Day</li>
</ol>
<strong>BDO Online Fund Transfer (Recommended for Regular Customers)</strong>

Register our account number <strong>001458019167</strong> once. Please follow BDO’s guideline here:
<ol>
 	<li><a href="https://www.bdo.com.ph/support-topics/v-internet-banking-performing-financial-transactions/fund-transfer-can-i-transfer" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> https://www.bdo.com.ph/support-topics/v-internet-banking-performing-financial-transactions/fund-transfer-can-i-transfer</a></li>
 	<li>Forward to <a>support@galleon.ph</a> the confirmation email BDO will send to you and indicate your order number on the subject line or body.</li>
</ol>
</div>
<strong>Security</strong> <strong>Payment Scheme</strong>

The total order amount will immediately be debited from your account upon completion of the checkout process. If you wish to cancel an order because of an error, you may do so by following our <a href="https://app1.staging.v2.galleon.ph/document/cancellations-and-returns" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Cancellations, Returns, and Refunds</a> guidelines.
<p class="no-indent">Installment payments will be made available in the near future.</p>
